img_text: COMPARED TO BEING EXPLOTED BY THOSE LIKE TO THE 7 STAR SECT IT WOULD BE MUCH BETTER TO BE EXPLOITED BY ME IN THE END! AND WHERE I5 THERE A DIFFERENCE?
